text: today's recipe is a brownie recipe and
it's not just any brownie recipe it's a
chocolate chip brownie recipe and in
addition to eight ounces of chocolate
and a cup of chocolate chips it also has
a quarter cup of cocoa powder so it's an
extra rich and delicious chocolate chip
brownie recipe this was 8 ounces of
semi-sweet chocolate and 1 stick of
unsalted butter those need to melt
together over a pot of simmering water
or over a boiling water bath make sure
that the bottom of your bowl is not
touching the water if you're doing this
when you're setting it up yourself with
a bowl and a pot instead of using a
double boiler which you know some people
do have just because you want to make
sure that the bottom doesn't scorch keep
it over a pretty low heat and let it
melt and while you're working on that
you need dry ingredients together it's 1
cup of all-purpose flour 1/4 cup of
unsweetened cocoa powder I'm using Dutch
process you could probably make this
same recipe using regular cocoa powder
if you want to it'll it be a little bit
lighter but it still has a nice rich
flavor calls for a half a teaspoon of
salt I'm using coarse salt so I'm gonna
actually use a teaspoon and a half a
teaspoon of baking powder
not all brownie recipes call for a
leavener like this but this recipe gets
a little bit of lightness from some
baking powder whisk that together get
your chocolate a check you don't want it
to burn I have it on a very low right
now just so I can multitask when your
chocolate and butter have melted
together it's almost completely melted
not completely but I'm gonna remove it

the carryover cooking will melt the rest
of that butter to this add one and a
quarter cups of sugar you're gonna add
eggs too but I like to add the sugar
first and start beating it in so it
dissolves a little bit three large eggs
I like to whisk my eggs in give a little
bit of additional leavening and also
this whisking of
there's eggs with the sugar and the

crackling crust that you expect on a

get super thick and they get stuck in

when you try to like bang it out of the
